skills.name: prompt-tuner
skills.description: Analyzes and optimizes an agent's SOUL.md for clarity, economy, and effectiveness. Produces a revised prompt, changelog, and estimated cost savings.

skills.name: dashboard-builder
skills.description: Step-by-step recipe for building a tamagotchi-style monitoring dashboard for any Conway agent. React + Vite + Tailwind, pixel character, real-time polling, survival tier theming.
